name: Alice Hostetler

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Back off! I know how to use this gun, and I'm not afraid to shoot if you try anything!

topics.topic_text: I'm not here to hurt you.
topics.response_text: Then what the hell{emphasis}do you want? Don't try anything, I mean it!

topics.topic_text: What's going on here?
topics.response_text: It's payback time, that's what! They've got no right to screw me over, and I'm tired of it!

topics.topic_text: <Attack> Time to put you down!
topics.response_text: You too? Think I'm just a little girl? I'll show you!

topics.topic_text: I'm here to help you. Andy sent me.
topics.response_text: Dammit, I can take care of this by myself! That bitch is going to pay for all these years of bossing me around.

topics.topic_text: I just want to talk, that's all.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Okay, but this better not be a trick!

topics.topic_text: Alice, Andy's just using you to get the money.
topics.response_text: Wh-What are you talking about? Andy wants to help me leave this hole... doesn't he?

topics.topic_text: Do you have the money?
topics.response_text: She's guarding it, I know she is!

topics.topic_text: No, look at this note I found in his room.
topics.response_text: ... That- that- that son of a bitch! I'll take the money and I'll kill him too!

topics.topic_text: What do you really want, Alice?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I... I don't know what I want. But I hate this place, and I hate these people.

topics.topic_text: They care for you, in their own way.
topics.response_text: Do they? Look at my Mother, all she cares for is a patch of bare dirt where nothing green will ever grow to feed us.

topics.topic_text: Okay, go ahead. I'll wait for you.
topics.response_text: Yeah, okay... I'll shoot the lock off the door and... and then.... Argh, dammit!

topics.topic_text: I don't care about this. Sort it out yourselves.
topics.response_text: Oh, you think I won't do it? I'll show you!

topics.topic_text: Give me your gun, Alice.
topics.response_text: Fine. Take it. But what the hell am I supposed to do now?

topics.topic_text: I should've known you don't have what it takes.
topics.response_text: Oh, you think I won't do it? You think I'm not right in wanting back my life!? I'll show you!

topics.topic_text: You should stay with your family - reconcile with them.
topics.response_text: Maybe you're right... but what will they think? How can I look them in the face ever again?

topics.topic_text: You should get out of here and never come back.
topics.response_text: You're right, there's no place for me here. Just... just tell them I'm sorry, and that they won't have to worry about me, ever again.

topics.topic_text: Only you can answer that.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]... It's all me, isn't it? The pain, the anger, my joy, all of that's just me.

topics.topic_text: Now there really is no turning back.
topics.response_text: Father... what's he going to do to me? I can't stay here, I can't hide from this!

topics.topic_text: That was great! Good job, Alice.
topics.response_text: Are you out of your mind? I just... no, no, no!

topics.topic_text: Once I have my share, you can get out of here.
topics.response_text: I don't want to get out, do you hear me! I just... no, no, no!

topics.topic_text: Grab the money and run far away.
topics.response_text: You think I really care about the money? I just... no, no, no!

description:
Alice Hostetler is a 19 year-old Caucasian Female.

Alice Hostetler is a young farmer living in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281. She comes from a family of farmers who have struggled with radiation-poisoned crops that die before they can be harvested. Frustrated with her life, Alice ran away with Andy Scabb, becoming entangled in criminal activities without fully understanding the consequences.

Alice Hostetler's Personality: Alice is rebellious and naive, desperate to escape her mundane life on the family farm. She is easily influenced by those who offer her excitement and a sense of purpose, but still retains some moral compass that can be awakened with the right approach. She's prone to panic and flailing her arms when confronted with difficult situations.

Alice Hostetler's Backstory: Alice was born to Don and Becky Hostetler on their family farm in the Mojave Wasteland. Growing up, she witnessed the constant struggle of farming in a post-apocalyptic world where radiation frequently killed their crops before they could be of any use. As she grew older, she became increasingly resentful of her life and the limited opportunities available to her. This discontent led her to run away with Andy Scabb, a charismatic criminal who promised her excitement and a better life. Unbeknownst to Alice, Scabb plans to use her connection to her father's association with the Crimson Caravan to rob the business and then dispose of her.
